subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXNPWLOX
WWUS76 KLOX 100456
NPWLOX

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
956 PM PDT WED MAY 9 2007

..DENSE FOG EXPECTED THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING OVER THE LOS ANGELES
AND VENTURA COUNTY COASTS...

AREAS OF DENSE FOG WITH VISIBILITIES OF ONE QUARTER MILE OR LESS
ARE EXPECTED TO DEVELOP OVER THE COAST OF VENTURA AND LOS ANGELES
COUNTIES TONIGHT AND PERSIST INTO THURSDAY MORNING. VISIBILITIES
WILL IMPROVE TO ONE HALF MILE OR MORE BY 9 AM THURSDAY.

CAZ040-041-101100-
/O.CON.KLOX.FG.Y.0010.000000T0000Z-070510T1600Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
956 PM PDT WED MAY 9 2007

..DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THURSDAY...

A DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THURSDAY.

LOW CLOUDS AND FOG...WITH AREAS OF DENSE FOG...WILL AFFECT THE
COAST OF VENTURA AND LOS ANGLES COUNTIES TONIGHT INTO EARLY
THURSDAY MORNING. VISIBILITIES SHOULD IMPROVE TO ONE HALF MILE OR
MORE BY 9 AM THURSDAY.

MAJOR ROADWAYS THAT WILL BE IMPACTED BY THE DENSE FOG
INCLUDE INTERSTATE 10 BETWEEN SANTA MONICA AND DOWNTOWN...
INTERSTATE 405 NEAR THE COAST...AND HIGHWAY 1 ALONG THE COAST
INCLUDING AREAS FROM MALIBU TO OXNARD.

DRIVERS ARE URGED TO USE CAUTION AS VISIBILITIES IN FOG CAN GO
FROM MORE THAN MILE TO LESS THAN SEVERAL HUNDRED FEET IN AN
INSTANT. SLOW DOWN...USE YOUR LOW BEAM HEADLIGHTS...AND INCREASE
YOUR FOLLOWING DISTANCE AROUND YOU.

$$

SIRARD
